statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_number = 12345;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE transaction_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY account_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT JSON_VALUE(transaction_history,'$.transactions[0].amount') AS first_transaction_amount FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT account_number, JSON_QUERY(transaction_history, '$.transactions[1].details') AS second_transaction_details FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance < 5000;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT id, balance, account_number FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_number;
SELECT id, balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, account_number FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE transaction_history LIKE '%deposit%' ORDER BY account_number ASC;
SELECT account_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_number HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT account_number, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_number ORDER BY latest_transaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM account_holders WHERE account_number = 1001;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_number HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM account_holders WHERE account_number = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_number, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY account_number;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount, c.balance FROM transactions t JOIN customer_accounts c ON t.account_number = c.account_number;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, customer_id FROM accounts ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT history_id, previous_balance, new_balance FROM transaction_history;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY account_number;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance FROM accounts;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, balance FROM customers ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT customer_id, address_line1, city, state, zip_code, country FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' AND balance < 500;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM accounts JOIN customers ON accounts.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE accounts.balance > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-30';
